meanings.definition: A scar left by the formation of new connective tissue over a healing wound.
meanings.sent1: The cicatrices on his arm told the story of his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent2: She had cicatrices on her knee from falling off her bike.
meanings.sent3: The cicatrices on the tree trunk looked like ancient runes.
meanings.sent4: The cicatrices of time marked the old building's facade.
meanings.sent5: The cicatrices on the map indicated the path of the river.

meanings.definition: A mark left on the skin or within body tissue where a wound, burn, or sore has not healed completely.
meanings.sent1: The cicatrices from the surgery were still visible on her abdomen.
meanings.sent2: His face bore cicatrices from the accident he had years ago.
meanings.sent3: The cicatrices on the fruit made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The cicatrices of past mistakes haunted her every day.
meanings.sent5: The cicatrices on the land showed the impact of the earthquake.
